version_description: This month we've freshened up the Move Money screens, made some improvements in the enrolment journey, and made sure the app runs nicely if you're running iOS 11.

Ready for a new way to fast-track funds into your B account? Because now all you need to deposit a cheque in moments is the B app and, well, a cheque.
Whether you’re enjoying a tea break or waiting for a bus it just takes a moment to snap a pic of the front and back of your cheque – and voila! We’ll do the rest.

As always, we've got bug fixes and subtle improvements in this update, along with some changes to prepare for something new coming soon. Watch this space!

- The team @ B

Keep your app up to date to get the benefit of the latest improvements and bug fixes.

We've introduced the 'B Secure' option with this release, which you'll soon be able to use to authorise payments started on the web.

A new year and a fresh new update to your favourite banking app.

We've done some work under the hood to speed up the payments screens. What does that mean? Fewer bouncing chickens!

And since we let you deposit cheques in the app last year, you can now order a new chequebook. Who said cheques were on their way out?

This update introduces new alerts to let you know when to top up your account for a payment to go through and to avoid possible charges. (Personal accounts only)

You can also now change the order your accounts appear on the main screen, so your main accounts are at the top.

This update introduces new alerts to let you know when to top up your account for a payment to go through and to avoid possible charges. (Personal accounts only)

You can also now change the order your accounts appear on the main screen, so your main accounts are at the top.

This update introduces new alerts to let you know when to top up your account for a payment to go through and to avoid possible charges. (Personal accounts only)

You can also now change the order your accounts appear on the main screen, so your main accounts are at the top.

You can now use the app to tell us how you’d prefer to be contacted about our products and offers. Just look for the Marketing Preferences screen in the More menu.

This update also gives you extra balance information for most current and savings accounts on the accounts screen.

And the app now fully supports Face ID if you’re using the iPhone X. Say cheese!
This release includes improvements to the new marketing consent preferences we recently added to the app, as well as other bug fixes and improvements.

Our new Connect Accounts feature lets you use your B app to see the balances on your accounts with other banks and building societies. Connect Accounts uses secure Open Banking technology.

It’s a real time-saver, giving you the whole picture about your money with only one log-in.

Update the app and you will be able to connect your Nationwide, RBS, Natwest and Ulster Bank current accounts to B.

It’s just the start – we're working hard to add more banks and building societies to Connect Accounts soon. We’ll keep you posted.

It's time to B connected.

- the Team at B

We've listened to your feedback and made some changes which allow you to move money between your own accounts without having to add a reference, as well as arrange future or repeating payments to a linked Credit Card.

And if you've got a linked currency account with us, you'll now be able to see this in the app too!

We've got a great new feature which lets you view the outcomes of your one-off payments and transfers. Just click on ‘Payments Status and History’ and you can see a list of the payments you have made since January 2018 as well as the status e.g. ‘paid’ and ‘pending’.

We’ve also added more banks to the Connect Accounts feature which lets you use your B app to see the balances on your current accounts with other banks and building societies. You can now connect your Lloyds Bank, Halifax, Bank of Scotland, Santander, HSBC, First Direct and M&S Bank current accounts to B in addition to Nationwide, RBS, Natwest and Ulster Bank.

We’ll keep you posted as we add even more banks to Connect Accounts.
-The team @ B

In this release we have added IBAN and BIC information to your ‘Account Details’ screen for savings and current accounts, and made sure the app runs nicely if you're running iOS 12.
In this release we have added IBAN and BIC information to your ‘Account Details’ screen for savings and current accounts, and made sure the app runs nicely if you're running iOS 12.
In this release, we have included some bug fixes and minor enhancements, including making terminology clearer and more intuitive.

New in this release, if you have a business as well as a personal account with us, is the ability to add a business profile and choose either your personal or business profile when you log into your Mobile Banking App

-The team @ B

Introducing B Store! A suite of tools, services and products to help you look after your money - all in your B app

Plus bug fixes and minor enhancements

This release has a cool new feature which allows you to rename your accounts to something you can remember. You will also find it easier to manage your alerts with smarter navigation.

We’ve added Barclays Bank to the Connect Accounts feature which lets you use your B app to see the balances on your current accounts with other banks and building societies. The list of Connected banks now includes Bank of Scotland, Lloyds, Halifax, Santander, RBS, Natwest, Ulster Bank, HSBC, First Direct, Nationwide, M&S Bank, Allied Irish Bank, Bank Of Ireland and Danske.

-The team @ B

We have increased the period for viewing your Digital Statements from 7 months to 24 months. In addition, the team at B have been super busy fixing some pesky bugs and making improvements to help make B better than ever.
-The team @ B

In response to customer demand, we have made it really easy to find your recurring payments as well as a list of your payees. What’s more, you can now choose to log out of your app automatically when you close your app. As usual, the team at B have been super busy fixing some pesky bugs and making improvements to help make B better than ever.

-The team @ B

You can now choose to go paperless and read your letters and documents online. Plus you’ll also be able to send and receive secure messages, and chat with us via your app. The team at B have also been super busy fixing some pesky bugs and making improvements to help make B better than ever.

-The team @ B

You can now chat with us via your app. The team at B have also been super busy fixing some pesky bugs and making improvements to help make B better than ever.

-The team @ B

We've updated the More Menu to help you get around the app more quickly. The team at B have also been super busy fixing some pesky bugs and making improvements to help make B better than ever.

You can now opt in to receive Push Notifications via the App.
The team at B have also been super busy fixing some pesky bugs and making improvements to help make B better than ever.

Your banking just got a little bit brighter. We update the B app regularly to bring you the best experience. With this release we've fixed a few bugs, and also made a couple more tweaks and service improvements.
